intro: Agelaea pruriens, commonly known as the itching plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Africa and Asia, where it thrives in moist, shaded environments. Agelaea pruriens is often used in traditional medicine for its purported healing properties.
